channel.title: Posts on Neural Network Night
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Neural Network Night

item.title: Jupyter Notebook
item.description: Neural Networking Night (NNN) establishes a platform for regular interactions and dialogue within the Ile-de-France Systems and Computational Neuroscience community. We propose an innovative and engaging project where a scientific seminar meets social interaction, the “Neural Networking Night”: Elevate the understanding of the brain in a social setting at a Neuroscience Seminar in “Le Piano Vache” pub (8 Rue Laplace, 75005 Paris), an iconic student pub in the academic 5th arrondissement.
